## My Shiny App

This is my first Shiny app that presents a **sample survey** using wind farm data.\
It shows how people make choices between different renewable energy options under various scenarios.\
The app is a simple example that demonstrates how a survey can be displayed in an interactive way.

### Access My App

[**Click here to open my Shiny App**](https://zocool.shinyapps.io/Wind_Farm/){target="_blank"}
